name: Baked Donuts
description:
Sort-out all color-matching donuts and prepare for the next challenge. It's not an easy task because the control is very precise and you have to choose the right moment to rotate the robot. Your success or failure is measured by the right and left bar graph, respectively.

HOW TO PLAY:

* Press the left or right arrow keys to rotate left or right
* Avoid any obstacle or enemy

FEATURES:

* Simple controls
* Unlock levels
